## AlTriggeredEvent.anyResponseWith() method

Returns true if the given callback returns true for any of the responses, or false otherwise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
anyResponseWith(checkCallback: {
        (responseValue: ResponseType): boolean;
    }): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  checkCallback | <code>{</code><br/><code>        (responseValue: ResponseType): boolean;</code><br/><code>    }</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
